title: RADS error
body: I  got a message about a RADS error and it prevented me from launching the League client. After a few attempts now it is working. Should I find the issue that cause the error or let it go?

replies.body: It was a temporary error and I'm fairly sure it was on Riot's end.
Oh okay thanks for letting me know.

There was an issue going on with some external network configurations that affected a few of our services and prevented logins. This has since been resolved, so let me know if you have any other questions or require any other assistance.
